func.title: GetPlrView

param.name: player
param.desc: Number of the player whose view you want to determine.

func.desc: Returns the object which is followed by a player's view. If the player view does not currently follow an object, the function returns 0 (also see GetPlrViewMode).
func.remark: If player view has been set using (SetPlrView), the view will follow the selected clonk (unless in view mode "Scroll", see GetViewMode). This can be determined using GetCursor.
